TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit StatusBarPanel extends System.ComponentModel.Component implements class System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize
Public Class StatusBarPanel Inherits Component Implements ISupportInitialize
type StatusBarPanel = class inherit Component interface ISupportInitialize

summary.span: 表示 控件中的一个面板。

span.span: Represents a panel in a control.

summary.span: 虽然 控件对以前版本的 控件的功能进行替换和添加，但是考虑到向后兼容性和将来的使用（如果您选择），仍然保留了 。

span.span: Although the control replaces and adds functionality to the control of previous versions, is retained for both backward compatibility and future use if you choose.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个表示中的单个面板的控件。A represents an individual panel in the of a control. 一个可以包含文本和/或可用于反映应用程序的状态的图标。A can contain text and/or an icon that can be used to reflect the status of an application. 使用，可通过访问的属性控件，用来检索、 添加或删除个人。Use the , accessible through the property of a control, to retrieve, add, or remove an individual . 提供的属性，使你能够修改中的面板的显示行为控件。The provides properties that enable you to modify the display behavior of a panel within a control. 可以使用属性来显示一个面板中的图标。You can use the property to display an icon within a panel. 此属性可以用于提供的图形表示形式的应用程序中的状态。This property can be used to provide a graphical representation of state in an application. 属性可用于指定文本和/或图标的面板内的对齐方式。The property enables you to specify how text and/or an icon is aligned within the panel. 若要确保，在面板的大小以适应面板的文本，可以使用空间中的属性自动调整大小以适应面板的文本或以填充剩余的面板控件。To ensure that your panel is sized properly to fit the text of the panel, you can use the property to automatically resize the panel to fit the text of the panel or to fill the remaining space within the control. 属性可用于指定要确保它不会小于其用来显示的数据的面板的最小宽度。The property enables you to specify a minimum width for the panel to ensure that it does not get smaller than the data it is intended to display. 控件通常用于显示帮助信息或有关你的应用程序的状态信息。The control is typically used to display Help information or state information about your application. 通常情况下，务必要显示在面板中显示的数据有关的其他信息。Often, it is important to display additional information about data that is presented in a panel. 可以使用属性时鼠标指针停留在一个面板上显示信息。You can use the property to display information whenever the mouse pointer rests on a panel. 尽管控件通常用于显示文本信息，还可以提供自己的类型的显示。Although the control is typically used to display textual information, you can also provide your own type of display to a . 属性可用于指定如何将绘制。The property enables you to specify how the will be drawn. 默认情况下属性用于显示的值属性 (一个图标，如果在指定属性)。By default, the property is used to display the value of the property (and an icon, if specified in the property). 如果该属性设置为，可以到面板中绘制您自己的信息。If the property is set to , you can draw your own information into the panel. 此功能可用于在面板中绘制进度栏或动画的图标。You can use this feature to draw a progress bar or an animated icon in the panel. 创建的实例时类，读/写属性设置为初始值。When you create an instance of the class, the read/write properties are set to initial values. 有关这些值的列表，请参阅构造函数。For a list of these values, see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将创建控件在窗体上，添加两个对象。The following code example creates a control on a form and adds two objects. 第一个名为`panel1`，显示应用程序的状态文本。The first , named `panel1`, displays status text for an application. 第二个名为`panel2`，显示当前日期，并使用属性的类，以显示当前时间。The second , named `panel2`, displays the current date and uses the property of the class to display the current time. 该示例使用属性以确保显示多个面板而不是标准的面板中，并使用属性来访问方法若要添加到面板。The example uses the property to ensure that the panels are displayed instead of a standard panel, and it uses the property to access the method of the to add the panels to the . 此示例还使用， ， ，和属性来初始化对象。The example also uses the , , , and properties to initialize the objects. 此示例假定在示例中定义的方法是定义和调用的构造函数从。This example assumes that the method defined in the example is defined and called from the constructor of a . [!code-cpp[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建的实例时，以下的读/写属性设置为初始值。When you create an instance of , the following read/write properties are set to initial values. |PropertyProperty|初始值Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| ||| ||| ||| ||`null`| ||1010| ||| ||一个长度为零的字符串。A zero-length string.| ||一个长度为零的字符串。A zero-length string.| ||100100| 可以更改任何这些属性通过单独调用属性的值。You can change the value for any of these properties through a separate call to the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将创建控件在窗体上，添加两个对象。The following code example creates a control on a form and adds two objects. 第一个名为`panel1`，显示应用程序的状态文本。The first , named `panel1`, displays status text for an application. 第二个名为`panel2`，显示当前日期，并使用属性的类，以显示当前时间。The second , named `panel2`, displays the current date and uses the property of the class to display the current time. 该示例使用属性以确保显示多个面板而不是标准的面板中，并使用属性来访问方法若要添加到面板。The example uses the property to ensure that the panels are displayed instead of a standard panel, and it uses the property to access the method of the to add the panels to the . 此示例还使用， ， ，和属性来初始化对象。The example also uses the , , , and properties to initialize the objects. 此示例假定在示例中定义的方法是定义和调用的构造函数从。This example assumes that the method defined in the example is defined and called from the constructor of a . [!code-cpp[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置状态栏面板中文本和图标的对齐方式。

span.span: Gets or sets the alignment of text and icons within the status bar panel.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用此属性将文本水平对齐和/或图标分配给面板的边框内的属性。You can use this property to horizontally align the text and/or icon assigned to the property within the borders of the panel. 可以向左、 右或居中对齐文本和图标。Text and icons can be aligned to the left, right, or center of the . 没有方法来独立地定位内的图标。There is no way to independently position an icon within the . 例如，不能定位到左侧和右侧的图标时对齐文本右侧。For example, you cannot position an icon to the left side of the while aligning the text on the right side. 图标始终定位到左侧和右侧的文本而不考虑文本对齐方式。The icon is always positioned to the left side of the text regardless of how the text is aligned. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用， ， ， ，并属性，以及如何处理事件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the , , , , and properties, and how to handle the event. 若要运行该示例，请将以下代码粘贴到窗体中。To run the example, paste the following code into a form. 调用`InitializeStatusBarPanels`窗体的构造函数中的方法或事件处理方法。Call the `InitializeStatusBarPanels` method in the form's constructor or event-handling method. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the status bar panel is automatically resized.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象设置为优先级高于设置为这些面板值。 objects set to have precedence over those panels set to the value. 例如，具有其属性设置为如果缩短与属性设置为需要该空间。For example, a that has its property set to is shortened if a with the property set to requires that space. 可以使用以确保的内容正确地显示在包含多个面板的控件。You can use to ensure that the contents of a are properly displayed in a control that contains more than one panel. 例如，您可能希望包含文本自动调整，它显示的文本量的面板 ()，而另一个面板显示一个所有者绘制进度栏将需要是固定的大小 ().For example, you might want a panel that contains text to adjust automatically to the amount of text it is displaying (), while another panel on the that displays an owner-drawn progress bar would need to be a fixed size (). ## Examples 下面的代码示例将创建控件在窗体上，添加两个对象。The following code example creates a control on a form and adds two objects. 第一个名为`panel1`，显示应用程序的状态文本。The first , named `panel1`, displays status text for an application. 第二个名为`panel2`，显示当前日期，并使用属性的类，以显示当前时间。The second , named `panel2`, displays the current date and uses the property of the class to display the current time. 该示例使用属性以确保显示多个面板而不是标准的面板中，并使用属性来访问方法若要添加到面板。The example uses the property to ensure that the panels are displayed instead of a standard panel, and it uses the property to access the method of the to add the panels to the . 此示例还使用， ， ，和属性来初始化对象。The example also uses the , , , and properties to initialize the objects. 此示例假定在示例中定义的方法是定义和调用的构造函数从。This example assumes that the method defined in the example is defined and called from the constructor of a . [!code-cpp[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/VB/form1.vb#1)]

[!code-cpp[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/VB/form1.vb#1)]

Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
abstract member Dispose : bool -> unit override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

param.name: disposing
param.span: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 ；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法由公共`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

span.para: 可以多次调用由其他对象。重写时小心不要引用已经释放的早期调用中的对象。详细了解如何实现，请参阅 [实现 Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。有关详细信息并，请参阅 [清理了非托管 Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) 和 [重写 Finalize 方法] (http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

can be called multiple times by other objects. When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to . For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

summary.span: 获取或设置要显示在状态栏面板中的图标。

span.span: Gets or sets the icon to display within the status bar panel.

value.span: 表示要显示在面板中的图标。

span.span: An that represents the icon to display in the panel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可用于显示表示你的应用程序或你的应用程序内的进程的状态的图标。You can use this property to display an icon that represents the state of your application or a process within your application. 例如，可以显示中的图标以指示是否正在进行中还是已完成保存操作的文件。For example, you can display an icon in a to indicate whether a file save operation is in progress or complete. > [!NOTE] > 没有方法来独立地定位内的图标。There is no way to independently position an icon within the . 例如，不能定位到左侧和右侧的图标采用一致的右侧使用文本同时属性。For example, you cannot position an icon to the left side of the while aligning the text on the right side using the property. 图标始终定位到左侧和右侧的面板的文本而不考虑文本对齐方式。The icon is always positioned to the left side of the panel's text regardless of how the text is aligned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此属性指示是否显示的文本或是否在面板管理作为一个所有者描述。You can use this property to indicate whether a displays text or whether the panel is managed as an owner-drawn . 若要确定何时需要创建的事件处理程序、 绘制事件的控件。To determine when a needs to be drawn, create an event handler for the event of the control. 作为参数传递给事件处理程序的事件使您能够确定需要绘制的面板。The passed as a parameter to an event handler of the event enables you to determine which panel needs to be drawn. 还提供了对象可以使用上执行绘制任务。The also provides a object you can use to perform drawing tasks on the . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性，委派，请类，枚举，和属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property, delegate, class, enumeration, and property. 若要运行该示例，请将以下代码粘贴到窗体中。To run the example, paste the following code into a form. 调用`InitializeStatusBarPanels`窗体的构造函数中的方法或事件方法。Call the `InitializeStatusBarPanels` method in the form's constructor or event-method. span.span: Gets or sets the text of the status bar panel.
The text displayed in the panel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性表示的文本显示何时属性设置为。This property represents the text that is displayed when the property is set to . 可以使用此属性来显示有关你的应用程序中的信息控件。You can use this property to display information about your application in a control. 例如，可以使用属性来显示帮助信息，当用户将鼠标移到菜单或显示名称和应用程序中打开的文件的位置。For example, you can use the property to display Help information when the user moves the mouse over a menu or to display the name and location of a file that is opened in an application. 在文本对齐，使用属性。To align the text within a , use the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将创建控件在窗体上，添加两个对象。The following code example creates a control on a form and adds two objects. 第一个名为`panel1`，显示应用程序的状态文本。The first , named `panel1`, displays status text for an application. 第二个名为`panel2`，显示当前日期，并使用属性的类，以显示当前时间。The second , named `panel2`, displays the current date and uses the property of the class to display the current time. 该示例使用属性以确保显示多个面板而不是标准的面板中，并使用属性来访问方法若要添加到面板。The example uses the property to ensure that the panels are displayed instead of a standard panel, and it uses the property to access the method of the to add the panels to the . 此示例还使用， ， ，和属性来初始化对象。The example also uses the , , , and properties to initialize the objects. 此示例假定在示例中定义的方法是定义和调用的构造函数从。This example assumes that the method defined in the example is defined and called from the constructor of a . [!code-cpp[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ToolTipText { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.ToolTipText : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置与状态栏面板关联的工具提示文本。

span.span: Gets or sets ToolTip text associated with the status bar panel.
The ToolTip text for the panel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用此属性以工具提示中显示其他信息，当鼠标指针停留在。You can use this property to display additional information in a ToolTip when the mouse pointer rests on a . 例如，可以显示一个工具提示，提供有关数据传输速度显示的文件传输状态。For example, you can display a ToolTip that provides data transfer speed for a that displays the status of a file transfer. 若要在应用程序中其他控件显示工具提示，请使用控件。To display ToolTips for other controls in your application, use the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将创建控件在窗体上，添加两个对象。The following code example creates a control on a form and adds two objects. 第一个名为`panel1`，显示应用程序的状态文本。The first , named `panel1`, displays status text for an application. 第二个名为`panel2`，显示当前日期，并使用属性的类，以显示当前时间。The second , named `panel2`, displays the current date and uses the property of the class to display the current time. 该示例使用属性以确保显示多个面板而不是标准的面板中，并使用属性来访问方法若要添加到面板。The example uses the property to ensure that the panels are displayed instead of a standard panel, and it uses the property to access the method of the to add the panels to the . 此示例还使用， ， ，和属性来初始化对象。The example also uses the , , , and properties to initialize the objects. 此示例假定在示例中定义的方法是定义和调用的构造函数从。This example assumes that the method defined in the example is defined and called from the constructor of a . [!code-cpp[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 检索一个字符串，该字符串包含面板的信息。

span.span: Retrieves a string that contains information about the panel.

returns.span: 返回一个字符串，该字符串包含控件的类名以及控件所含的文本。

span.span: Returns a string that contains the class name for the control and the text it contains.

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件中状态栏面板的宽度。

span.span: Gets or sets the width of the status bar panel within the control.
The width, in pixels, of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性始终反映的实际宽度且不能为小于属性。The property always reflects the actual width of a and cannot be smaller than the property. 若要自动调整大小的宽度的内容，可以使用属性。To automatically resize the width of the to the contents of the , you can use the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用， ， ， ，并属性，以及如何处理事件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the , , , , and properties, and how to handle the event. 若要运行该示例，请将以下代码粘贴到窗体中。To run the example, paste the following code into a form. 调用`InitializeStatusBarPanels`窗体的构造函数中的方法或事件处理方法。Call the `InitializeStatusBarPanels` method in the form's constructor or event-handling method. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

exception.span: 指定的宽度小于 属性的值。

span.span: The width specified is less than the value of the property.
